info.title: Treasury Position Flow â€“ Read
info.description: You can use this inbound service to read treasury position flows. The treasury position is the most detailed level in which you can break down the balance sheet accounts in the Treasury and Risk Management ledger. The treasury position flows are generated by the operative or derived business transactions to update the position components of the treasury positions. The service provides you with detailed information about each selected treasury position flow, such as amount, currency, dates, differentiation criteria of the affected treasury position, business transaction, and update type.

x-sap-shortText: Read treasury position flows using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Market Rates Management - Manually via Upload(1XN)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1XN " Link To BP ")
[Market Data for Treasury and Risk Management(OXN)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OXN " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_TrsyPosFlow HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
